description:
Build Your Own Self-Hosted Dropbox in less than 2 hours!!!

Tired of being limited to what you can do with Dropbox, OneDrive, or GoogleDrive?? Well now you don't have too. By taking this course I will show you how to build you're own self-hosted DropBox like cloud solution for you're convenience.

Whether you need this for work, personal use, or just extra storage space, this course will teach you everything you need to know to do all of these things.

What You Get:

  • Easy to follow, step by step instructions.
  • Open Source Cloud Sharing Solution
  • Free Domain Name & Reliable Web Hosting Information
  • Personal Contact With Me
  • 7 Days a Week Programming Support & Help

What will I need for this course?

Everything is provided for you in the course besides the computer and internet access.

My Goal For You:

By the end of this course my goal is for you to understand how to develop & build an online forum. Your site should be operational and customized to your liking by the end of the course.

Problems?

If you have problems following any of the lectures, let me know and I'll try to set up a live Q&A session to guide you through.

Need Additional Help?

If you are still struggling throughout the course I will personally help you to make sure you complete the course and fully understand everything as well as help you get your cloud up and running.
title: Build Your Own Self-Hosted Dropbox in less than 2 hours
